Create Single Comparison Plot (Internal)

Source: R/plot.R
dot-create_single_comparison_plot.Rd

Creates a single comparison plot with title unit formatting.

Usage

.create_single_comparison_plot(
  data,
  x_axis_from,
  plot_title,
  unit,
  compare_by_experiment,
  color_tone,
  panel_rows,
  panel_cols,
  legend_position = "none",
  invert_panel = FALSE,
  panel_var = "Experiment"
)

Arguments

data

Data frame containing the data for the plot

x_axis_from

Column name to use for x-axis

plot_title

Title for the plot

unit

Unit of measurement

compare_by_experiment

Logical. If TRUE, compares experiments within x-axis categories

color_tone

Base color for the plot

panel_rows

Number of panel rows

panel_cols

Number of panel columns

legend_position

Position of the legend: "none", "bottom", "top", "left", or "right"

invert_panel

Logical. If TRUE, swaps the roles of Experiment and split_by in faceting

panel_var

Character. Column name to use for panel faceting

Value

A ggplot object
